metadata.name: Arcalyst 160 mg 2mL Injection powder lyophilized for solution

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Investigated for use treatment in myocardial infarction heart disease and asthma

incompatibilities.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Calcitonin gene related peptide can be decreased when used in combination with Patent Blue
Calcitonin gene related peptide may increase the vasodilatory activities of Isosorbide mononitrate
